snippet: Misinformation, exaggerations, conspiracy theories, overheated rhetoric and outright lies about the political crisis in Ukraine have emanated from the highest echelons of the Kremlin.
abstract: Russia has waged an extraordinary propaganda campaign about the political crisis in Ukraine, one that analysts say reflects a new brazenness on the part of Russian officials; Russia has largely succeeded in painting a picture of danger and chaos in eastern Ukraine, although it was pro-Russian forces themselves who created crisis by seizing public buildings and setting up roadblocks.

byline.contributor: Andrew Roth and Noah Sneider contributed reporting from Moscow, and Andrew Higgins from Kiev, Ukraine.

lead_paragraph: Misinformation, exaggerations, conspiracy theories, overheated rhetoric and outright lies about the political crisis in Ukraine have emanated from the highest echelons of the Kremlin.

headline.main: Russia Is Quick to Bend Truth About Ukraine
headline.print_headline: Russia Is Quick to Bend Truth About Ukraine
